document.full_text: manny pacquiao weighed in just two pounds lighter than american shane mosley after the filipino was welcomed by deafening cheers from his supporters on the eve of saturday's wbo welterweight title fight.
document.title: manny pacquiao weighs in lighter than shane mosley
lines_and_colors: manny pacquiao weighed in just two pounds lighter than american shane mosley after the filipino was welcomed by deafening cheers from his supporters on the eve of saturday's wbo welterweight title fight.
